tasks.instruction: Design a comprehensive system architecture for the LLM-powered Vastu-aware architectural design system that supports both interior and exterior design capabilities. Based on the PRD at /workspace/vastu_architect_ai_prd.md, create a detailed system design document that includes: 1) Overall system architecture with microservices approach, 2) LLM integration layer for natural language processing, 3) Vastu knowledge base and rule engine, 4) 3D rendering and visualization components, 5) Database design for projects, materials, furniture, plants, 6) API design for frontend-backend communication, 7) Real-time collaboration features, 8) Cloud infrastructure and scalability considerations, 9) Security and data privacy measures, 10) Integration points with external CAD tools and libraries. Output the complete system design document with architectural diagrams and technical specifications.
